short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate and use temporary email addresses for website signups and email privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📧 Introducing 5 Minute Email, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to revolutionize the way you interact with online registrations. 😍

Say goodbye to spam, promotional emails, and inbox clutter with our seamless temporary email service. With 5 Minute Email, gain instant access to a disposable email address that protects your personal information and keeps your primary inbox clean.

Why Use 5 Minute Email?

☑️ Instant Email Creation: Generate a temporary email in just a click. Perfect for website signups, forums, and any site requiring an email address.
☑️ Absolute Privacy: Protect your main email from spam, tracking, and phishing attempts. Your privacy is our priority.
☑️ Effortless Management: View and manage your temporary emails directly from the Chrome toolbar. Easy access when you need it the most.
☑️ Completely Free: Enjoy the full suite of features at no cost. 5 Minute Email is committed to providing a top-tier service for free.

Features at a Glance:

☑️ One-Click Email Generation: Create a new disposable email address with a single click. It’s that easy.
☑️ Direct Inbox Access: Access your temporary inbox with ease. View, copy, and use your disposable email without leaving your current tab.
☑️ Automatic Clean-Up: Emails and addresses expire automatically. No manual cleanup needed, ensuring your data remains secure.
☑️ Global Accessibility: Wherever you are, 5 Minute Email is there too. Use our service worldwide for any online registration or form.

Ideal For:

- Signing up for new websites and services without revealing your real email address.
- Testing and reviewing websites without exposing your primary inbox to potential spam.
- Managing signups for one-time events, promotions, or newsletters you don’t want to keep receiving emails from.

Give us a try and keep your inbox free of unwanted clutter!
